parameters.name: DomainName
parameters.description:
The streaming domain.

Separate multiple domain names with commas (,).

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description:
The end of the time range to query. The end time must be later than the start time. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the *yyyy-MM-dd*T*HH:mm:ss*Z format. The time must be in UTC.

>  If you specify neither the StartTime parameter nor the EndTime parameter, the data of the last **1** hour is returned.

parameters.name: IspNameEn
parameters.description:
The name of the Internet service provider (ISP).

You can call the [DescribeCdnRegionAndIsp](~~448109~~) operation to query a list of available ISPs.

parameters.name: LocationNameEn
parameters.description:
The name of the region.

You can call the [DescribeCdnRegionAndIsp](~~448109~~) operation to query a list of available regions.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description:
The beginning of the time range to query. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the *yyyy-MM-dd*T*HH:mm:ss*Z format. The time must be in UTC.

>  If you specify neither the StartTime parameter nor the EndTime parameter, the data of the last **1** hour is returned.
